TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridView extends System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class GridView Inherits ViewBase Implements IAddChild
public ref class GridView : System::Windows::Controls::ViewBase, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type GridView = class inherit ViewBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 代表會在 控制項資料行中顯示資料項目的檢視模式。

span.span: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其支援的類別提供基礎結構，以便顯示指定的資料項目一系列的專欄中的控制項。The class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a control in a series of columns. 資料行具有資料行標頭，也就是衍生自的按鈕，及您可以使用拖放作業重新排列欄位。The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from , and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations. 請注意，資料行顯示資料，並不提供直接存取資料的來源。Note that the columns of a display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data. 若要指定做為檢視模式，如，將屬性設物件。To specify a as the view mode for a , set the property to a object. 類別衍生自。The class is derived from . 您可以定義自訂的檢視，藉由繼承自類別，可提供支援的項目檢視。You can define custom views by inheriting from the class that provides the supporting elements for a view. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：建立 ListView 的自訂檢視模式](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-a-custom-view-mode-for-a-listview.md). 下圖顯示的範例使用。The following illustration shows an example of a that uses a . ![ListView 與 GridView 輸出](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView 與 GridView 輸出")![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") 中的資料行定義為物件。The columns in a are defined as objects. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以定義物件做為子項目的。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define objects as child elements of the . 在程式碼中，您可以加入來利用屬性和方法所定義類別。In code, you can add a to the by using the property and the method that is defined for the class. 同樣地，您可以使用其他這類方法並修改中的資料行。Similarly, you can use other methods such as and to modify the columns in a . 下列範例示範如何定義的資料行。The following example shows how to define the columns of a . [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] 若要設定樣式中的資料列，定義的樣式中的控制項。To style the rows in a , define a style for the controls in the . 若要將視覺元素，例如或是控制項，為，使用範本或樣式。To add visual elements, such as a or control, to a , use templates or styles. 如需範例，請參閱[How to:核取方塊使用 checkbox 建立 ListViewItems](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md)。For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-create-listviewitems-with-a-checkbox.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義控制項，可實作做為其。The following example shows how to define a control that implements a as its . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行標頭使用的字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.

value.span: ，可用來定義資料行標頭的顯示屬性。

span.span: The that is used to define the display properties for column headers.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性和屬性都可用來定義視覺化樹狀結構物件，表示資料行標頭。The property and the property are both used to define the visual tree for the objects that represent the column headers in a . 屬性也可以定義資料行標頭內容的時機未藉由指定藉由定義如物件。The property can also define column header content when a is not by specified by defining a for the object. 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 當您設定樣式時，但有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `StyleResourceKey` 識別所要求的樣式索引鍵。The key that identifies the style being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 繫結參考使用，或也是可行的但不常見。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## summary.span: 取得或設定複合字串，這個字串會指定如何格式化顯示為字串之 的資料行行首。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 複合字串，指定如何格式化顯示為字串之 的資料行行首。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或屬性設定時，會忽略這個屬性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用數個屬性來指定資料行標頭的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果設定一個以上的屬性時，資料行標頭的格式與具有最高優先權的屬性值。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以數種類型上設定資料行的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 下列清單顯示可用來格式化資料行標頭，從最低到最高的優先順序排序的屬性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定用來顯示資料行行首的範本。

span.span: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.

value.span: ，用來顯示 中的資料行行首。

span.span: The to use to display the column headers as part of the .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性和同時設定了屬性，屬性會優先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `TemplateResourceKey` 索引鍵，識別所要求的範本。The key that identifies the template being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 繫結參考使用，或也是可行的但不常見。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewHeaderTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewheadertemplate)] [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewColumnHeaderContainerTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnheadercontainertemplate)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector { System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::DataTemplateSelector ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定選取器物件，這個物件提供選取每個資料行行首所使用之範本的邏輯。

span.span: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.

value.span: 物件，判斷每個資料行行首所使用的資料範本。

span.span: The object that determines the data template to use for each column header.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定這個屬性，是使用預設邏輯的所有資料行，如果已定義的屬性。If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the property for all columns if it is defined. 如果屬性和同時設定了屬性，屬性會優先。If the property and the property are both set, the property takes precedence. 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey` 識別選取器實作所要求的索引鍵。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 索引鍵參考衍生類別實作實際覆寫。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 您可以也以程式設計方式新增的執行個體您類別做為應用程式資源字典中的資源。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to the application resource dictionary. `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation` 類別衍生自實作實際覆寫。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示下列其中一種配置，並設定資料行行首的樣式。This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `toolTipContent` 成為的顯示文字的字串。A string that becomes the display text for the . `toolTipObjectContent` 要作為工具提示內容的物件。An object to use as the content for the tooltip. 一般而言，這個物件是或其他項目定義的配置，例如文字項目。Typically, this object is a or some other element that defines a layout for the , such as a text element. 這項用法中項目會以隱含方式建立的已剖析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而`toolTipObjectContent`內容設定為其屬性。In this usage, a element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 請參閱 。See . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorderPart1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewallowscolumnreorderpart1)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorderPart2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewallowscolumnreorderpart2)] [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorder](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewallowscolumnreorder)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewAllowsColumnReorder](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewallowscolumnreorder)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個唯讀靜態屬性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]藉由將其靜態的值指派給另一個屬性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具體來說，這個屬性的靜態值會定義用來查閱 預設值的資源索引鍵樣式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style of a . 若要重新定義此樣式，參考藉由使用[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)並將該值做為指派[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個唯讀靜態屬性，在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]藉由將其靜態的值指派給另一個屬性值。You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value. 具體來說，這個屬性的靜態值會定義用來查閱 預設值的資源索引鍵樣式。Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default style. 若要重新定義此樣式，參考藉由使用[X:static 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)並將該值做為指派[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)新。To redefine this style, reference the by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of the new . 您可以使用這個唯讀屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]作為[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)的，會重新定義如。You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) of a that redefines the for the .
